text: Alison Marion Lohman (September 18, 1979 in Palm Springs, California) is an American movie and television actress. She has been in theatrical features, including White Oleander and the erotic 2005 biography Where the Truth Lies (the latter was given an NC-17 rating by MPAA; it was later released unrated). Lohman has also been in TV programs, including 7th Heaven and She is Voiced by Katherine in Flicka. ==References== Category:Actors from Riverside County, California Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:People from Palm Springs, California
title: Alison Lohman
